attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Aspartine has been directly linked to serious health-problems, banned in the US and Europe yet is still allowed in most soft-drinks in the UK - quelle suprise. BAN IT.

rejection.details: Too similar to existing petition: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/sweeteners/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
